By signing up you accept MALLet's Terms of service and Privacy policy Cancel OK Confirm new password To change your password, please follow the instructions New password Old password Please, confirm new password Please, input new password Please, input your password Enter your password To continue, please enter your password Home Library Add new Your library Profile Sign up with your email address Log in here Log in with your email address Folder name This field cannot be empty Description (optional) Description Group name Allow group members to edit sets and add new members Color theme Notifications switch Profile photo Save button Folders View all Groups Recent sets settings icon Email incorrect "The password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one digit, one small letter, one big letter and one special character" The username can only consist of letters, numbers, and underscores theme_name Add sets There are no sets in this group Add learning sets to share them with your friends toolbar options Group back arrow Number of sets There are no sets in this folder Organise your sets by sorting them into folders User icon Folder %s members %s sets %s terms

Create account! err Continue Term #%s %s term %s terms Great start! 🌟 Every journey begins with a single step. 

Keep going, and success will follow! 🚀 Nice effort! 👍 You are on your way to mastering this material. 

Keep pushing yourself to reach new heights! 🌄 Well done! 🎉 You are making solid progress. 

Consistency is key, and you are proving that with each question 📚 Fantastic job! 👏 You are really getting the hang of this. 

Believe in your abilities - you are capable of achieving even more! 🌈 Outstanding! 🌟 You are mastering the material with each passing question. 

Your dedication is paying off, keep up the excellent work! 💪 Incredible performance! 🎊 You are achieving excellence in this test. 

Your hard work and determination are shining through. 

Keep aiming high! 🚀 Perfect score! 🏆 You have aced the material and demonstrated an impressive level of knowledge. 

Your dedication and intelligence are truly commendable. 

Congratulations! 🎉 You finished the test in %s seconds and scored %s points! 👏 %s minutes %s seconds %s seconds group_name Learning set Member toolbar options There is no vocabulary here Add set_name set_description user_name nr_of_terms flashcards icon Flashcards Review terms and definitions learn icon Learn Study in your own pace test icon = Take a test to check your knowledge match icon Match Match vocabulary in a simple minigame Flashcards in this set Study this set A copy of the set you choose will be added to this group Search Confirm Are you ready? Match all terms to definitions and translations as quickly as you can. 

For each incorrect match, 5 extra seconds will be awarded to your time Start playing question save group You do not have permissions to edit sets in this group %s terms Delete set from group Delete set Get ready for a series of %s questions 🤔 

Make your answers clear and accurate 🎯 If you're not sure, no worries! We'll show you the correct ones to learn from 📚 

Let's dive in and get started! 💪 Welcome to Learn! Congratulations! 🌟 You've covered all the material! 📚 

Now, you can dive back in for some practice or try out different study modes - it's all up to you! 🚀 There are %s questions coming your way, and they come in three flavours:


● Written - we advise you to share clear and concise responses 🖋️ 
● Single Choice, where you need to pick the best answer 🔠 
● True/False - here you have to decide if statements are correct or not ✅❌


No time limit, just give it your best shot! 🚀 motivational_message Congratulations! Please check your email and click on the link we sent you to confirm your registration 📧🔗 Sorry, but there are not enough flashcards in your set to generate a test for you 😕

Add more data to it or try different modes of study 📚 answer Test Test (available with %s+ flashcards) Match (available with %s+ flashcards) Good job! You aced the memory game! 👏

⏰ Time elapsed: %s
